title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions: Make taking out the trash a breeze with the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags! This pack of 50 unscented bags is perfect for any 13-gallon trash can. Made of tear-resistant white plastic with Flex-tra strength, these bags are designed to handle even the heaviest loads. The red drawstring closure makes tying up the bag quick and easy. Plus, with Alexa voice shopping enabled, you can easily replenish your supply with just a simple command. Keep your kitchen clean and tidy with these reliable and convenient trash bags!
